title: I NEED TO CHANGE NAME.. BUT.. READ PLEASE
body: So i need to change my name. but i cant. it says is already owned. i checked the person that owns it. HE IS LEVEL 1! he doesnt play games at all. and he has it.. do something answer to me riot please i need your answer

replies.body: Every account is protected by the[ summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), even a level 1 account.  We can't share when a name would become available, so your best bet would be to check the store regularly if you're waiting for a specific name.
